entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:19 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 07:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: SW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then increasing to 40 gusting to 70. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
